mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make professional fitness coaching accessible to everyone, everywhere.

vision.description: A world where everyone has access to personalised fitness guidance.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded with a passion for fitness and technology, we set out to revolutionise how people connect with fitness professionals.

values.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in everything we do.
values.integrityDesc: We operate with honesty and transparency.
values.innovationDesc: We continuously innovate to improve our platform.
values.communityDesc: We foster a supportive fitness community.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Sign up and tell us about your fitness goals, preferences, and requirements.

step2.title: Find Your Coach
step2.description: Browse our marketplace of verified fitness professionals and find your perfect match.

step3.title: Book Sessions
step3.description: Schedule sessions that fit your calendar, online or in-person.

step4.title: Achieve Your Goals
step4.description: Follow your personalised plans, track progress, and reach your fitness goals.

step1.title: Apply to Join
step1.description: Submit your credentials and certifications for verification.

step2.description: Create a compelling profile showcasing your expertise and services.

step3.description: Connect with clients, manage bookings, and expand your reach.

step4.description: Get paid securely and build lasting client relationships.
